com.skobbler.ngx.map
Class SK3DCameraSettings

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.skobbler.ngx.map.SK3DCameraSettings

public class SK3DCameraSettings
extends java.util.Observable

Stores parameters that apply to camera positioning and orientation in 3D mode

Version:
2.5

Constructor Summary
SK3DCameraSettings()
           
 
Method Summary
 float getCenter()
          Gets the position of the rotation point (value should be between 0.1 and 0.9, default is 0.3, 0.5 is middle of the screen)
 float getDistance()
          Gets the distance from the viewpoint to the map (value should be between 0 and 300, default is 144)
 float getTilt()
          Gets the rotation angle of the map in degrees (value should be between 0 and 90, default is 15)
 void setCenter(float center)
          Sets the position of the rotation point (value should be between 0.1 and 0.9, default is 0.3, 0.5 is middle of the screen)
 void setDistance(float distance)
          Sets the distance from the viewpoint to the map (value should be between 0 and 300, default is 144)
 void setTilt(float tilt)
          Sets the rotation angle of the map in degrees (value should be between 0 and 90, default is 15)
 java.lang.String toString()
